description: The rooster's early-morning crowing led to a legal battle over noise pollution last year.
title: Maurice the noisy French cockerel dies aged six
title_page: Maurice the noisy French cockerel dies aged six - BBC News
maintext: "I said to myself that with lockdown, people already had enough to worry about," Corinne Fesseau was quoted as saying by French radio network, France Bleu. "We've bought a new cockerel and we've called him Maurice too - he sings just as well. But he will never be our Maurice."
